nodes.text: TaggeCo, also known as Tagge Corporation, was a company owned and operated by the Tagge family. In the last decades of the Galactic Republic, it was notably involved in marketing and distributing food products. At the time, the company's central strategy planning offices were located on Coruscant. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the company also maintained mining operations. Many years after the defeat of the Empire, TaggeCo still existed. One of its subsidiaries, Galacti-Stok, produced the Happy-Bore Medicated Dewormer, a dewormer designed to control and rid happabores of parasites. Around 3 ABY, the company was headed by Lady Domina Tagge.
